Microsoft-Academic.title: detection of bacterial dna in lymph nodes of crohn s disease patients using high throughput sequencing

ANDS-Grants.description: Australia's biodiversity is continually threatened by new epidemics of diseases and parasites, some local, others from overseas. This project will provide information on how they spread so that more effective management of these diseases can be developed to protect wildlife species, animal populations and, ultimately, Australian ecosystems.
ANDS-Grants.title: Parasite transmission through social networks in the pygmy bluetongue lizard
institutions: The Flinders University of South Australia
managingInstitution: The Flinders University of South Australia
